public class BlogPostingPolicy
extends ContentBasePolicy
implements com.polopoly.model.ModelTypeDescription, Rssable, BlogPosting, com.polopoly.cm.PublishingDateTime

Policy for an Editorial Blog Posting.

WARNING: The Editorial Blog functionality contained in Greenfield Times is intended to support a reasonably small flow of editorial blog content. It is NOT intended as a large-scale publishing tool where the amount of postings for any single blog becomes more than trivial.

An individual blog should not be used for more than a few hundred postings. Anything more will inevitably lead to a rapidly decreasing performance, mainly experienced while saving new blog postings.

getShortTitle

public java.lang.String getShortTitle(int maxLength,
                                      java.lang.String rightPadding)
Truncates the title if needed and adds the right-padding. The user has to take into account the space of the padding.

Specified by:
getShortTitle in interface BlogPosting
Parameters:
maxLength - The number of characters to retain
rightPadding - The padding the right end after truncation, if null then no padding is performed.
Returns:
the short title
